Description: Year of sample collection in the field
Number of individuals in composite sample
Mean individual wet mass (composite sample mass/n per composite)
Chain of custody number associated with analytical instrument run
Sample identification assigned by analytical lab
Sample identification assigned in field by research staff
Value Definition: alphanumeric code representing site, sample type, and sample dates

Description: Date of sample collection in the field
Date sample received by the analytical lab

Value Definition: nanograms per gram wet weight for solid or tissue samples. Nanograms per milliliter for liquids.
ND = not detected, NM = not measured, na = not available due to sample damage
Whether the concentration is below the reporting limit. Yes indicates the concentration is above the method detection limit, but below the reporting limit
General format is site_samplenumber_sampletime, but some are variable

Description: Sample ID internal to USGS isotope lab
Year of sample collection in the field
Aquatic or Terrestrial origin of sample
Chain of custody number associated with analytical instrument run
Sample identification assigned by analytical lab
Sample identification assigned in field by research staff
Date of sample collection in the field
Date sample received by the analytical lab

Value Definition: ND = not detected, NM = not measured, na = not available due to sample damage
Twenty-two integers, one for each PFAS type
